title: Purge unlike any other: 9 top Chinese generals expelled — Why Xi is cleaning house again
content: China's President Xi Jinping has purged nine top generals, including the second-highest-ranking officer, in a significant crackdown on the military. Accused of "seriously violating party discipline" and a "total collapse of beliefs," these expulsions escalate Xi's anti-corruption and loyalty campaign ahead of key personnel changes.

title: 'Every inch within range': Rajnath warns Pak, says Op Sindoor was 'just a trailer'
content: Describing BrahMos as a symbol of India’s rising strength, Singh said, "BrahMos is not just a missile, it is proof of India's strategic confidence. From the Army to the Navy and the Air Force, it has become a key pillar of our defence forces." He added that India’s defence capabilities now serve as a strong deterrent.

title: IND vs AUS: 'It will be a very funny thing' - Kohli, Rohit get message ahead of 1st ODI
content: Virat Kohli returns to the Indian team for the ODI series in Australia. His childhood coach Rajkumar Sharma states Kohli has nothing left to prove. Sharma believes Kohli is well-prepared and will perform well. The series marks Kohli's first international appearance since March. His form and leadership will be closely watched. The matches are scheduled across Perth, Adelaide, and Sydney.

title: Upset Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says: Our market share has fallen to Zero from 95% in ...
content: Nvidia's advanced AI chip dominance in China has evaporated, dropping to zero due to US export controls. CEO Jensen Huang revealed the company is completely barred from selling high-performance chips, warning this exclusion harms both nations and cedes the market to domestic rivals like Huawei.  China's push for self-sufficiency accelerates this shift.

title: 'Nuclearised environment': Munir at it again; makes unprovoked remark at Indian military
content: Pakistan army chief Asim Munir issued a stern warning to India, threatening a "decisive response" and "military and economic losses beyond imagination" amid border tensions. He placed the onus of any escalation on India, urging them to resolve core issues based on equality and mutual respect.

title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
content: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: Explained: How New York’s rich and famous are panicking about Zohran Mamdani
content: New York's wealthiest are experiencing a unique panic as socialist mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani gains traction, challenging their long-held influence.  Despite attempts to counter his campaign with donations and backroom deals, Mamdani's message resonates with a younger, less affluent electorate, forcing the elite to confront their diminishing control over the city's future.

title: Yuvraj Singh mourns Afghan cricketers killed in Pakistan airstrikes
content: Tragedy struck Afghanistan's cricket fraternity as three young players were killed in a Pakistani airstrike near the border.  Former Indian cricketer Yuvraj Singh expressed deep sorrow, calling for peace. The Afghanistan Cricket Board confirmed the incident, leading to their withdrawal from an upcoming series.  Captain Rashid Khan and other players condemned the attack, mourning the loss of aspiring cricketers.

title: Jeff Bezos' ex-wife cuts Amazon share; slashes stake by $12.6B; increases charity
content: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, cutting holdings by nearly 42% to $12.6 billion. This reduction occurred despite Amazon's stock performance and follows her extensive philanthropic efforts, which have heavily focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. The exact reasons for the stake reduction, whether sales or donations, remain unspecified.

title: Bihar polls: Does Left hold key to MGB's victory? What battle of 2020 reveals
content: In Bihar's 2020 elections, the Left parties, particularly CPI(ML), showed a strong performance, nearly matching the BJP's strike rate. Five years later, they are pushing for a larger seat share in the Mahagathbandhan, citing their past success and widespread presence, though negotiations remain uncertain.

title: 'Foreign servant': JD Vance's old comment resurfaces, draws flak
content: Vice President JD Vance's resurfaced comments calling foreign talent as 'foreign servants' have sparked controversy. Critics, including social media users and former Biden adviser Ajay Bhutoria, have accused Vance of racism, pointing out his marriage to an Indian-origin woman and highlighting the contributions of immigrants to the US economy and innovation.

title: IND vs AUS:Records Virat Kohli can break; ODI series starts tomorrow
content: Virat Kohli returns for the ODI series against Australia. He is close to becoming the second-highest ODI run-scorer. Kohli also needs runs to surpass Sachin Tendulkar's combined limited-overs total. Another century will give him the record for most centuries in a single format. This tour also marks his preparation for the 2027 Cricket World Cup.

title: Not Elon Musk, this silent bureaucrat is reshaping America for Trump
content: Vought’s story begins far from the marble halls of Washington. Raised in a devout Christian household in Connecticut, he was steeped in a worldview that saw government authority as an extension of divine will. His mother founded a Bible-centric school where students were asked to “defend the statement that all governmental power comes from God.”

title: Ranji Trophy: Rinku surpasses Dravid, Jaiswal; scores career-best unbeaten 165
content: Rinku Singh's stellar 165 steered Uttar Pradesh to a draw against Andhra in their Ranji Trophy opener.  Coming in with UP struggling, Rinku's disciplined 273-ball innings, including a vital partnership, showcased his red-ball prowess.  This remarkable knock also saw him surpass notable Indian batters in first-class averages, highlighting his growing stature.

title: Vanessa Bryant and daughters erupt in joy after Ohtani leads Los Angeles Dodgers to NLCS victory
content: Vanessa Bryant, a devoted Los Angeles Dodgers fan, was recently seen cheering on the team with her daughters Bianka and Capri. The family celebrated as Shohei Ohtani led the Dodgers to an NLCS victory against the Milwaukee Brewers. Bryant also shared moments with Freddie Freeman's wife, Chelsea, at the star-studded game. The Dodgers defeated the Milwaukee Brewers with an overall score of 4-1.

title: Bihar polls: Prashant Kishore exits political ring - Calculated gamble or misstep?
content: Jan Suraaj chief Prashant Kishor will not contest Bihar elections, aiming to disrupt the state's power dynamics instead. While rivals accuse him of accepting defeat, analysts suggest his focus on party candidates could be a strategic move. Kishor's ambitious target of winning over 150 seats will be tested against Bihar's complex political landscape.

title: Dhanteras 2025: How much will gold rise by next year & should you buy? Top points
content: Dhanteras 2025 gold buying: Investors who bet on gold and silver last Dhanteras and Diwali have seen bonanza returns. Are gold and silver good investment bets over the next year? We ask experts what the gold and silver price outlook is and what levels will they hit by Dhanteras 2026.

title: The mirror turns: Pak blames Afghanistan for terror; makes absurd India link
content: His comments came after at least six people, including two children, were killed and seven others injured in airstrikes conducted by Pakistan in Afghanistan’s southeastern Paktika province. The strikes reportedly violated a recent ceasefire agreement between the two countries. Media reports said that representatives from both sides are expected to meet in Doha, Qatar, to address the situation.

title: Mega Rayquaza raid day guide for Pokemon GO: Tips, rewards & details
content: Pokemon GO players can prepare for Mega Rayquaza Raid Day on October 18, 2025. This global event features special raids for the powerful sky dragon. Trainers have a chance to encounter Shiny Rayquaza and earn exclusive rewards. Special tickets offer additional bonuses. Players need Meteorites to teach Rayquaza Dragon Ascent. Ice-type Pokémon are recommended for raids.

title: Who were the Afghan cricketers killed by Pakistan air strike?
content: Three young Afghan cricketers were among eight civilians killed in a reported Pakistani aerial strike, prompting Afghanistan to withdraw from an upcoming tri-nation series. The incident, occurring shortly after a ceasefire, has intensified tensions between the two nations. Prominent Afghan players have condemned the attack as barbaric and a heinous crime.

title: Delhi: AQI worsens in several parts of the city
content: Raising concern regarding higher levels of AQI, Pulmonologist Dr. Sharad Joshi from Ghaziabad said, "Air Quality Index (AQI) has risen significantly, leading to higher levels of particulate pollutants from sources like crop burning, vehicular exhaust, and fireworks. This exacerbates respiratory issues for those with conditions such as COPD, asthma, or a history of tuberculosis, causing symptoms like cough, fever, breathlessness, and chest pain."

title: Raj Babbar ‘never picked up work on Diwali’; son Aarya Babbar reveals it is a tradition in the family - Exclusive
content: Bollywood actor Aarya Babbar reveals Diwali at his home is a cherished family tradition, emphasizing togetherness and simple rituals. He shares that his father, Raj Babbar, instilled a strict no-work policy during the festival, a sentiment echoed by the entire family and respected by the film industry. Celebrations include prayers, new attire, eco-friendly crackers, and shared sweets.

title: Shami hits back at chief selector Agarkar: 'It is all in front of your eyes'
content: Pacer Mohammed Shami has hit back at chief selector Ajit Agarkar's fitness concerns following a stellar Ranji Trophy performance. Shami, who took seven wickets against Uttarakhand, questioned the selectors' stance, stating his bowling speaks for itself. Agarkar had previously cited fitness issues as the reason for Shami's exclusion from the ODI squad, but the bowler's recent display challenges this narrative.

title: Caught on cam: Woman robbed, fingers severed with machete in Bengaluru; 2 arrested
content: Two men have been arrested for a brutal robbery in Bengaluru where a woman's fingers were severed with a machete. The accused attacked two women returning from a festival, snatching gold chains and inflicting severe injuries when one resisted. CCTV footage captured the disturbing incident.

title: SSC CHSLE 2025: Candidates can now choose exam city, date and shift for CBT from 12 November
content: SSC CHSLE slot selection 2025: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has opened the self-slot selection portal for CHSLE 2025 Tier 1, starting November 12, 2025. Candidates can choose their exam city, date, and shift between October 22 and October 28. If preferred slots are unavailable, alternative cities will be offered. No changes will be allowed after selection. Non-selection will be treated as unwillingness to appear. A detailed guide with screenshots will be available on the candidate portal.

title: 'Gill has shown he can lead with results': Former WC-winning captain
content: Diwali week ignites cricket excitement with Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's return to India's ODI squad. New white-ball captain Shubman Gill receives praise from Aaron Finch, who believes it's the right time for his leadership. Both Rohit and Virat will play under a new captain for the first time since 2016.

title: Dhanteras 2025: Shubh Muhurat to buy Gold and Silver
content: Dhanteras, marking the start of Diwali, falls on October 18, 2025. This auspicious day signifies wealth and prosperity, making it ideal for purchasing gold and silver. Devotees honor Lord Kuber and Goddess Laxmi, seeking blessings for good fortune. Several auspicious timings, or shubh muhurats, are available throughout October 18th and 19th for these significant purchases.

title: Fire at MPs' complex: Blaze hits Brahmaputra Apartments in Delhi; 12 tenders rushed
content: A swift response from emergency services contained a fire at Brahmaputra Apartments, a Rajya Sabha members' residential complex on Bishambhar Das Marg, New Delhi. Firefighters, arriving promptly with 12 tenders, successfully extinguished the blaze by 2:10 pm after receiving the alert at 1:22 pm. Cooling operations were underway following the incident.

title: Parineeti Chopra heads to Delhi as pregnancy nears delivery, baby expected soon - Report
content: Parineeti Chopra has moved to Delhi as she prepares to welcome her first child with husband Raghav Chadha. The couple announced their pregnancy in August 2025 with a heartfelt Instagram post. Celebrities showered them with congratulations, and Raghav teased good news on The Kapil Sharma Show.

title: Maharashtra: 8 dead, 8 injured as vehicle falls at Chandshali Ghat in Nandurbar
content: At least eight individuals lost their lives and eight others sustained injuries in a tragic accident in Maharashtra's Nandurbar district on Saturday. The vehicle reportedly fell at Chandshali Ghat within the Shahada police jurisdiction. The injured are currently receiving medical attention at a local hospital.

title: Bihar polls: 8 INDIA bloc allies risk friendly fights as multiple candidates stay in fray
content: INDIA bloc partners faced a seat-sharing deadlock as nominations closed for the first phase of elections. Despite the impasse, candidates filed papers, with eight seats seeing friendly fights. VIP founder Mukesh Sahani opted out of contesting to focus on campaigning for the alliance's victory and a potential deputy CM role.

title: Badminton: Tanvi Sharma enters final of World Junior Championship
content: Tanvi Sharma secured at least a silver medal at the BWF World Junior Championships by defeating China's Liu Si Ya in the semi-finals. She will face Thailand's Anyapat Phichitpreechasak in the gold medal match, aiming to add to her earlier bronze from the Badminton Asia Junior Championships.

title: 'Don’t cross the limit': Jharkhand HC advocate tells judge; verbal spat goes viral
content: Jharkhand High Court's full bench issued a criminal contempt notice to advocate Mahesh Tewari for a heated exchange with Justice Rajesh Kumar.  The advocate's statement, "The country is burning with the judiciary," aired live and went viral. Tewari must respond within three weeks, with the next hearing on November 11.

title: 'Exploring resources': After oil, India-Russia to tie-up on rare earth?
content: India is seeking partnerships with Russian firms to secure vital rare earth magnets and minerals, a move driven by China's tightening export controls.  Indian companies and research institutions are evaluating Russian processing technologies, aiming to diversify supply chains and bolster domestic production. This collaboration is part of a wider effort to reduce reliance on China for these critical resources.

title: Shohei Ohtani makes history with leadoff homer as wife Mamiko cheers his big night
content: Shohei Ohtani made MLB history by hitting a leadoff home run in a postseason game, becoming the first pitcher to do so. His dual-threat brilliance on the mound and at the plate electrified the Dodgers' playoff push. The night was also marked by the heartwarming return of his wife, Mamiko, to the stands.

title: Pak-Afghan clashes: Trump blames Islamabad; calls conflict 'easy' to solve
content: US President Donald Trump on Friday claimed that Pakistan attacked Afghanistan, asserting he could easily resolve the conflict. On Saturday, Pakistan announced talks with the Afghan Taliban in Qatar after launching air strikes that killed at least 10 people, breaking a recent ceasefire. Afghanistan accused Pakistan of bombing three locations, vowing retaliation.

title: Stock market holidays: Are NSE, BSE open Oct 20-22 & when is Muhurat Trading?
content: Stock markets will observe a special Diwali trading session on October 21, despite being closed for Lakshmi Puja and Balipratipada on October 21 and 22 respectively. This symbolic 'Muhurat Trading' marks the Hindu financial year's start, historically bringing optimism. Investors should note these dates and the unique trading window.

title: 'I've been played all my life ... ': Trump says Putin might be buying time
content: President Trump expressed skepticism that Russian President Putin's agreement to a new summit might be a tactic to delay ending the Ukraine war, though he believes Putin wants a deal. Trump met with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy, calling his call with Putin "productive" and believing peace is achievable, despite acknowledging "tremendous bad blood" between the leaders.

title: Telangana bandh: Statewide protest against HC stay order on BC quota
content: Telangana observed a statewide bandh on Saturday, protesting the High Court's stay on 42% BC reservation in local body polls. All major political parties, including the ruling Congress, supported the agitation, with leaders disrupting bus services. The bandh aims to pressure the government following the court's interim order.

title: Bihar elections: Folk singer Maithili Thakur files nomination from Alinagar
content: Folk singer and BJP leader Maithili Thakur has filed her nomination papers from the Alinagar Assembly constituency for the upcoming Bihar elections. She expressed her commitment to the service, development, and welfare of the people of Alinagar, thanking party leadership and supporters for their trust and blessings.

title: Ready for another wild weekend in college football? The 32 games that demand your attention
content: Ole Miss-Georgia, Bama-Tennessee, LSU-Vandy, USC-Notre Dame and more big matchups make for a jam-packed Saturday.

title: Ohtani's 2-way show for the ages sends L.A. to WS
content: Shohei Ohtani pitched six scoreless innings, struck out 10 batters and clobbered three home runs in a performance many of his Dodgers teammates described as the greatest in baseball history.

title: Louisville's 'great plan' rattles Beck, No. 2 Miami
content: Louisville intercepted four of Carson Beck's passes as the Cardinals shocked the No. 2 Hurricanes 24-21.

title: Forest fires manager minutes after Chelsea loss
content: Nottingham Forest have sacked Ange Postecoglou just 39 days after appointing him as head coach on Sept. 9.

title: Springer hurt on HBP; Schneider calls out fan boos
content: Blue Jays designated hitter George Springer left Game 5 of the ALCS after getting hit by a pitch on his right kneecap in the seventh inning. X-rays were negative, according to manager John Schneider.

title: Suárez's clutch slam leaves M's one win from WS
content: Eugenio Suárez hit a go-ahead grand slam after Cal Raleigh's tying drive in a five-run eighth inning, giving the Seattle Mariners a 6-2 win over the Toronto Blue Jays and a 3-2 American League Championship Series lead.

title: Alonso: Protests over Miami LaLiga game 'positive'
content: Real Madrid coach Xabi Alonso backed player protests over LaLiga playing a regular-season game in Miami.

title: Lakers start Vincent for LeBron in opener preview
content: Using Friday's preseason finale as a "dress rehearsal" for next week's regular-season opener, Lakers coach JJ Redick put Gabe Vincent in the starting lineup to fill in for the injured LeBron James.

title: NFL Films' deleted Branch video draws Lions' ire
content: Lions players took offense to an NFL Films video that was released, then deleted, on social media involving suspended safety Brian Branch, claiming it was overly critical.

title: Ohtani's Game 4 reminds us of the improbability of his greatness
content: A 469-foot blast, a series-clinching gem on the same night? We got the full Ohtani October experience.

title: Our last-minute catch-up on Week 7: Big predictions, stat trends, fantasy sleepers
content: Should we expect a big day for the Bucs' receiving core? Can Quinshon Judkins go over 100 yards? And which AFC game could be low-scoring?

title: Our guide to every game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: Offense showdown in Bucs-Lions? Who wins Jayden Daniels vs. Dak Prescott? We have picks and predictions.

title: Introducing ESPN's Basketball Power Index for 2025-2026: Predictions for 23 NBA teams
content: The code is written. The simulations run. Here's who BPI projects to be in the top six in each conference, those fighting for play-in spots and three teams with high-variance young prospects.

title: The Bush Push revisited: A time capsule of the iconic Notre Dame-USC matchup, 20 years later
content: The Bush Push was more than just an iconic moment in the USC-Notre Dame rivalry -- its aftershocks affected both teams, the 2005 postseason and the rulebook.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Can Reinier de Ridder continue his 2025 win streak?
content: ESPN MMA experts make their predictions and give betting tips for UFC Fight Night from Vancouver, British Columbia.

title: Jalen Hurts' passing game has fallen short of what the Eagles need
content: It's never a good idea to bet against the QB, but it's fair to say he hasn't gotten there yet this season.

title: 'He was a different dude': Looking back at Jim Harbaugh's career-best season with the 1995 Colts
content: This year marks the 30th anniversary of the 1995 Colts' magical run and Jim Harbaugh's best season as a quarterback.

title: Can Dortmund keep pace with Bayern? We're about to find out
content: Perfect Bayern, unbeaten Dortmund, first vs. second: Der Klassiker doesn't need extra fanfare. This is a meeting of the best in the Bundesliga.

title: Chelsea ratings: Neto earns 8/10 in win at Forest that got Ange fired
content: Pedro Neto starred in Chelsea's 3-0 victory at Nottingham Forest that ultimately cost Ange Postecoglou his job after just eight games in charge.

title: 'Change is a must': WNBA owners, insiders on Cathy Engelbert, officiating, CBA
content: Have owners and executives lost faith in the WNBA commissioner? We canvassed insiders on the biggest topics at the WNBA Finals.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Jaxon Smith-Njigba hits 2K, TreVeyon Henderson breaks out
content: Will Seattle's star receiver can keep up his impressive pace? Is a breakout game ahead for a Patriots rookie?

title: Fantasy Football Buzz: What extreme weather means for Dolphins, Browns starters
content: With extreme gusts expected for Dolphins-Browns on Sunday, how does the weather affect the game plan?

title: The NHL's small-sample shock teams: Who has under- and overperformed?
content: We explore what has happened (good or bad) for seven particular teams -- and predict whether it'll continue.

title: 🏈 How Penn State unraveled under James Franklin
content: Penn State entered the season with national title aspirations. Six games in, the school fired its coach.

title: ↔️ Barnwell pitches 13 pre-deadline NFL trades
content: Jakobi Meyers to the NFC East? Trey Hendrickson and Jaelan Phillips to the same team? Russell Wilson to a contender? Let's build 13 win-win trades.

title: ⚽ Trump threatens to remove WC games from Boston
content: President Donald Trump threatened on Tuesday to revoke Boston's World Cup matches if local authorities don't get tougher on crime.

title: 😡 Postgame fight mars Chiefs' win against Lions
content: A long, frustrating night for the Lions ended with safety Brian Branch delivering an open-handed strike to Chiefs wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster, setting off a brief fight among players from both teams.

title: 🏀 Cal: I'd retire before becoming 'transactional'
content: John Calipari has no plans to leave college basketball but said if he can no longer build relationships with players and do the job the way he wants, he'll exit the sport.

title: 🔥 Taking the temperature of NFL's hottest seats
content: Should the Dolphins or Ravens make coaching changes? Is it time for a QB switch for the Jets? Might the Eagles consider moves in their secondary?

title: Which teams benefitted most from the transfer portal -- or didn't?
content: Which programs over- or underperformed in the portal ahead of the 2025-26 season based on previous cycles?

title: Florida's throwbacks, Oregon's all-white look lead Week 8 college football uniforms
content: Multiple teams are rocking throwbacks in Week 8 of the college football season, led by the Florida Gators.

title: Week 7 betting guide: Saquon comes to life, Josh Jacobs keeps rolling
content: Our experts dive into the lines and player props that offer value for Week 7 and share their tips and bets.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Bayern aim to beat Liverpool to Guéhi
content: Liverpool face strong competition from Bayern Munich for Crystal Palace defender Marc Guéhi. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Talent, emotional intelligence and a lifetime of sacrifice have made Oscar Piastri a F1 title favorite
content: There's no doubting Oscar Piastri's talent, but what's set him apart in his F1 title quest is his ability to control his emotions.

title: ‘Trans rights reduced to dead letters’: SC appoints panel to frame job, education policy
content: As legal editor for Delhi, Abhinav Garg handles coverage of courts and connected legal challenges shaping the capital. From breaking down complex law related jargon to simplifying how a particular verdict or development in courts may impact the readers, Abhinav brings with him over two decades of experience in the field. Read More

title: Bangladesh: Fire breaks out at Dhaka airport; all flights suspended
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. Join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world. Read More

title: NDTV World Summit 2025 LIVE: 'Homebound' Talks Of Empathy, Says Ishaan Khatter
content: NDTV Global World Summit 2025 LIVE Updates: The 2025 edition of the NDTV World Summit, which saw powerful speeches, including by PM Narendra Modi, and impactful discussions yesterday, will see several more global leaders taking stage today.

title: "What If I Don't Die?" Axis Max Life CEO Sumit Madan On Often Asked Question About Life Insurance
content: Imagine buying a beautiful car, something you've always desired. Maybe it's a bottle green Bentley or something like that, right? Or a really expensive electric vehicle.

title: Cracks Evident In Mahayuti As Senior Leaders Swipe At Each Other
content: As tensions rise between Mahayuti partners Shiv Sena and the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ahead of local body polls, senior Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) leader and minister Chhagan Bhujbal launched a sharp attack on the BJP.

title: "Should Look At All Options": Harvard Professor On Indians Wanting To Study In US
content: Urging India to invest more in science, Tarun Khanna, the Jorge Paulo Lemann professor at the Harvard Business School, has said no country has escaped middle-income status without doing so.

title: "Biggest Phobia" About Electric Vehicles": Experts Give Their Take
content: Vehicles that run on electricity are the future but the technology is still in nascent stage. The need of the hour is to adopt it for public transport and alongside it, assuaging the concerns of customers, said a team of experts and entrepreneurs.

title: Fire At Dhaka Airport's Cargo Section, All Flight Operations Suspended
content: A major fire broke out at the cargo terminal of Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport in Dhaka on Saturday, forcing the suspension of all flights.

title: Taiwan's Main Opposition Elects New Leader Amid Claims Of Chinese Meddling
content: Taiwan's main opposition Nationalist Party chose a former lawmaker as its new chairperson on Saturday in a competitive election clouded by allegations of China's meddling.

title: The Great INDIA Bloc Muddle: A Comedy Of Errors In Bihar
content: In the unfolding drama of the Bihar assembly polls, the INDIA bloc - an alliance that once promised a united front against the ruling NDA - has transformed into a farcical spectacle of misalignment and muddle.

title: IIT Bombay Alumnus Secretly Films Male Students In Hostel, Case Filed
content: Police have registered a case against a 32-year-old former student of IIT Bombay for allegedly secretly recording videos of the male students residing in the institute's hostel while they were taking bath, officials said on Friday.

title: Hemant Soren's Party To Contest 6 Seats In Bihar Polls
content: Jharkhand's ruling JMM on Saturday announced that it will contest the Bihar assembly polls independently, and field candidates in six seats.

title: Friendly Fire Likely On Bihar's Multiple Seats, Congress Digs In Heels
content: The stage is inevitably set for friendly fire within Bihar's Grand Alliance in several constituencies .

title: Projectile Attack Sets Ship Ablaze Off The Coast Of Yemen In Gulf Of Aden
content: A ship caught fire Saturday in the Gulf of Aden off Yemen after being struck by a projectile, the British military said.

title: Soldier Saves 8-Month-Old's Life Through CPR On Speeding Train
content: An ambulance assistant of the Indian Army returning to duty from leave administered mouth-to-mouth resuscitation to an eight-month-old infant on a train and saved his life, a Defence official said on Saturday.

title: Interests Of Farmers, Small Industries To Be Protected In India-US Trade Talks: Piyush Goyal
content: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal said talks between India and the US on the proposed bilateral trade agreement are progressing in a cordial atmosphere and New Delhi will protect the interests of farmers, fishermen and MSME sectors

title: Leh Sees Restrictions, Kargil Holds Silent March Over Ladakh Statehood
content: A planned silent march, jointly called by Leh Apex Body and Kargil Democratic Alliance as part of their agitation for statehood and safeguards under sixth schedule of the constitution, was thwarted here on Saturday

title: 40 Years Worth Of Scandals: Prince Andrew's Fall From Grace, Step By Step
content: Britains Prince Andrew was forced to relinquish use of his remaining royal titles after the latest revelations about his relationship with the convicted pedophile Jeffrey Epstein proved one scandal too many for his brother, King Charles III.

title: NDTV World Summit 2025: No Plastic Cards, OTPs - Mastercard's Gautam Aggarwal Says This Is The Future Of Payments
content: A plastic debit or credit card that we use today may not exist in the coming years, said Gautam Aggarwal, CEO, South Asia, Mastercard, suggesting that the future of payments could entirely be digital, requiring no physical form.

title: Sheikh Hasina To Muammar Gaddafi, A Look At Leaders Who Fled Uprisings
content: Many supposedly invincible leaders have been forced to flee their countries or have gone into hiding to avoid incarceration, execution, or political retaliation by successor governments due to revolutions, military coups or mass protests.

title: "Alimony Not For Financially Independent": Delhi Court Denies Maintenance to Railway Officer
content: The Delhi High Court has ruled that alimony cannot be awarded to a spouse who is financially self-sufficient and independent, observing that permanent alimony is a measure of social justice and not a tool for enrichment or financial equalisation

title: Reconsider, Revoke Appointment Of Gorkha Talks Interlocutor: Mamata Banerjee To PM Modi
content: Expressing "surprise and shock" over the appointment of an interlocutor to hold discussions on the issues relating to Gorkhas, Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on Saturday wrote to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and demanded revocation of the decision.

title: Karnataka Forest Minister Khandre warns of strict action against forest encroachment
content: The Minister says reckless exploitation of natural resources driven by human greed had led to widespread pollution of air, water, and food, resulting in serious health issues.

title: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu keen to address employees’ issues, says Group of Ministers
content: The GoM tells representatives of the government employees’ unions and associations that efforts are under way to concede their demands to the extent possible in spite of constraints

title: History-sheeter dies after being shot at by police in Vijayapura district
content: A history-sheeter who was shot in the leg by the Police, after he tried to escape by assaulting them in Rampur (PA) village of Sindgi taluk of Vijayapura district, breathed his last on Saturday.

title: SIT examining the money trail in Sabarimala gold ‘theft’ case
content: The team inspects the house of prime suspect Unnikrishnan Potti purportedly for confiscating financial records to pinpoint the alleged amassing of unaccountable wealth. Cyberforensic sleuths are checking Mr. Potti’s mobile phone record logs to trace his online financial transactions

title: India-E.U. trade talks: Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal to visit Brussels October end
content: Engagements between the two sides have increased as they have decided to conclude the negotiations by December

title: BRS hits out at Congress, BJP for enacting dramas in BC quota name
content: Former Minister Harish Rao says nobody could stop quota hike if the two parties join hands in Parliament on the issue

title: Dugong conservation centre being planned in ‘No-Development Zone’ sparks concern
content: A fishing community leader says this does not comply with the CRZ Notification; according to activists, a concrete building offers little benefit to dugongs, whose conservation depends on protecting their natural habitat

title: Countries vote to delay implementation of carbon-free shipping plan
content: Member countries of the International Maritime Organization postpone the plan amid threats from U.S. President Donald Trump. The strategic plan was aimed at moving the shipping industry away from the use of fossil fuel.

title: Kerala has not benefited from GST regime, finds Estimates Committee of the State Assembly
content: Panel recommends to conduct a comparative study of pre-GST and post-GST revenue growth and an assessment of revenue growth in a hypothetical scenario where the GST was not introduced

title: 3,397 people booked in 3,209 NDPS cases this year
content: Of the 3,209 cases, 18 are related to seizure of narcotic items in commercial quantity, which varies according to the nature of the substance; 475 kg of suspected ganja seized this year

title: Raebareli lynching case: two more held, total arrests 16 so far
content: Following the attack, police registered a case and arrested 14 people, including the main accused, who was held after an encounter on October 10

title: Police constable arrested in Belagavi for stabbing estranged wife to death
content: A police constable has hacked his estranged wife to death in Belagavi district. The brutal murder, which took place on October 13, came to light on Friday

title: KL Deemed to be University in A.P. launches three satellites designed by its students
content: CAN SAT satellite of KLU students has been selected for ‘Make in India’ and ‘Atmanirbhar’ competitions, scheduled to be held in Uttar Pradesh on October 27

title: PM a mauni baba, says Congress in dig at Modi after President Trump repeats his claim about Russian oil imports
content: Congress communications chief Jairam Ramesh makes remarks hours after the U.S. president repeated his claims that India will not be buying oil from Russia, saying that the country has already ‘de-escalated’ and is ‘pulling back’

title: IMD issues orange alert for South Coastal Andhra Pradesh and Rayalaseema on October 23, 24
content: Heavy to very heavy rain is expected in these areas due to a low-pressure area forming over the Bay of Bengal

title: Water level rises by six feet in Mullaperiyar dam; T.N. alerts Kerala about possible floods in Idukki district
content: The reservoir recorded an inflow of 40,733 cusecs on Friday and the discharge rose to 7,000 cusecs by 1 p.m. on Saturday; several families in low-lying areas in Kerala have been shifted to relief centres

title: Tourists spots closed after Pahalgam attack need to be reopened: J&K CM Omar Abdullah
content: We know that homes of lakhs of people depend on it and we want tourism to be restored to the level that was there before the Pahalgam attack, the CM added

title: BBA student in Bengaluru ends life allegedly due to harassment by her senior
content: Based on the complaint filed by Abdul Nazeer, a civil contractor at Virajpet in Kodagu district, the Bagaluru police have registered a case of abetment to suicide against the accused, identified as Refaas, a native of Thrissur, Kerala., for further investigation.

title: Health screening begins for all tribal school students in Parvathipuram-Manyam district
content: Move follows death of two children and hospitalisation of several others; medical teams to cover 30,000 students under special drive

title: SIT searches Unnikrishnan Potti’s ancestral house, likely to question TDB official soon
content: During interrogation, Potti is learned to have given statements implicating officials of the Travancore Devaswom Board in irregularities at the Ayyappa temple

title: Rally for anti-conversion law held in Arunachal Pradesh
content: The Indigenous Faith and Cultural Society of Arunachal Pradesh demanded the implementation of the Freedom of Religion Act of 1978

title: Youth Congress workers try to lay siege to RSS office in Hubballi, detained
content: The protestors raised slogans against RSS, condemned in strong terms the threat call to Minister Priyank Kharge and demanded a ban on RSS

title: Women account for 49% of hospital admissions under AB-PMJAY: National Health Authority report
content: Thirty-five States and Union Territories, with the exception of West Bengal, are now under the Ayushman Bharat-Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana, the Central government’s flagship health insurance scheme

title: Won't ally with BJP for restoration of statehood to J&K: CM Omar Abdullah
content: The chief minister said if the restoration of statehood is dependent on the BJP coming to power in J&K, then the national party should be honest in saying so

title: Shift Vizianagaram government hospital to college campus for better patient services, DME urged
content: Uttarandhra Ambedkarites Association cites poor facilities and doctor absenteeism at the Cantonment hospital and urges that idle lab equipment be put to use

title: Man injured in LPG cylinder blast in Bengaluru
content: The injured, Janardhan K.C., a native of Madikeri, was working at a private company and was living alone following the death of his wife

title: Live-in relationship rules under UCC to be amended: Uttarkhand government in affidavit to HC
content: The affidavit read that the proposed changes focus on improving the process for registration and termination of cohabiting relationships, lending greater clarity in sharing information with the police

title: Administrative sanction for ₹99.94 lakh for Varkala Maidanam underpass beautification
content: The project, which aims at enhancing the aesthetic appeal of the area, includes proper maintenance of the underpass, better lighting, facilitating ambience and safety, and creation of artwork

title: New daily superfast train between Hubballi and Bengaluru to be operational from Dec. 8
content: The new train will not only connect the State capital with North Karnataka but benefit people of seven to eight districts

title: PHC doctors in Andhra Pradesh continue strike as talks with government make no headway
content: While the Medical Education Principal Secretary has reiterated that 20% seats will be allocated for the PHC doctors in the clinical branches of PG courses, the protesters are insisting that 15% quota be fixed for three years

title: JMM to contest Bihar polls independently, field candidates in six seats
content: “The party has decided to contest the Bihar polls on its own. It will contest six assembly seats – Chakai, Dhamdaha, Katoria (ST), Manihari (ST), Jamui and Pirpainti,” JMM general secretary and spokesperson Supriyo Bhattacharya said.

title: Ensure jailed leader Mehraj Malik can vote in Rajya Sabha polls: High Court to Jammu and Kashmir government
content: Justice Rajesh Sekhri directed the government to ensure that the detainee is allowed to cast his vote, says Aam Aadmi Party spokesperson

title: Fire Services Department issues safety guidelines for Deepavali celebrations
content: Officials urge people to buy crackers only from licensed shops; police conduct surprise checks and hold awareness drives in Eluru and Krishna districts

title: Traders in the Karnataka-Tamil Nadu border ditch risky fireworks to avoid accidents this Deepavali
content: Hosur, a major wholesale fireworks hub in the Karnataka-Tamil Nadu border, has more than 100 wholesale cracker shops.

title: In letter to Modi, Bengal CM Mamata seeks revocation of appointment of interlocutor on Gorkha issues
content: The West Bengal CM claimed her government was not consulted before retired IPS officer Pankaj Kumar Singh was appointed as an interlocutor to hold discussions on the issues relating to Gorkhas

title: Bureau of Indian Standards must focus on sector-specific standards: Union Minister Shobha Karandlaje
content: She commended BIS’s outreach through Standards Clubs and awareness programmes, describing them as crucial to nurturing a ‘quality-first’ culture across the country

title: 'All options open', says Congress on fielding candidates for 2 vacant Jammu and Kashmir Assembly seats
content: The MLA also said the party has resumed its ‘Hamari Riyasat Hamara Haq’ programme to press for the restoration of Statehood to J&K

title: Tamil Nadu opens all 13 shutters of Mullaperiyar dam after heavy rains
content: Officials said that following heavy rainfall in the areas surrounding the dam, the inflow was 40,733 cusecs and the reservoir level was at 132.90 feet at 11 p.m. on Friday (October 17). At 3 a.m. (October 18), the storage level reached 136 ft.

title: Kurnool’s KIMS doctors perform complicated spinal surgery
content: To address the condition, doctors decided to perform a highly complex spinal surgery, which lasted for six hours

title: Statehood of J&K to be restored at appropriate time: Shah
content: About the recent agitations in Ladakh, Mr. Shah said the Union government is "in talks with the committees of Leh and Kargil".

title: Soldier posted in Assam saves baby on train
content: The mother of the eight-month-old infant aboard the Rajdhani Express fainted, thinking her child had died

title: Collector calls for public participation to make Guntur clean and green
content: The Collector urged residents to use public transport and bicycles at least once a week to reduce air pollution and help improve air quality

title: Kerala consumer rights panel imposes fine on insurance company for rejection of health insurance claim
content: A fine of ₹96,000 imposed on Aditya Birla Health Insurance Company Ltd on the charges of deficiency in service and unfair trade practice

title: Nellore SP warns of strict action against fake social media posts
content: Superintendent of Police Ajitha Vejendla directs the staff to thoroughly inspect firecracker manufacturing centres, godowns and retail stores to ensure that safety standards are being followed

title: Zubeen's death: 9 held over violence near Baksa jail in Assam
content: Several others involved in the violence have been identified, and a search is underway to arrest them, Baksa senior superintendent of police (SSP) Ujjal Pratim Baruah said

title: Kerala’s Supplyco offers 10% discount to women customers on non-subsidised items
content: Concessionary rate for women will apply in conjunction with the below-market rate for branded rice, cooking oils, and a range of non-subsidised household products

title: Bikes, cars and televisions have seen price drop post GST rate cut, says Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman
content: Nirmala Sitharaman said the government has been monitoring price cuts in 54 items across the country since the lower GST rates came into effect on September 22

title: YSRCP urged not to oppose development
content: The proposed investment by Google will create around 1.8 lakh direct and indirect jobs and will transform Vizag into a global AI innovation hub, BJP State spokesperson pointed out

title: Indian Army’s Northern Command sets new benchmarks of preparedness in multi-domain warfare
content: The exercise, over four days, challenged commanders, staff, and troops with futuristic threats in cyber, space, electromagnetic, and cognitive domains, says Defence spokesperson

title: Massive fire breaks out at residential complex housing several Lok Sabha, Rajya Sabha MPs in New Delhi
content: Some residents have claimed that a few children were injured in the incident and taken to RML Hospital

title: Diwali dreams grounded: Delhi-bound Air India jet stalls in Milan; over 250 flyers stuck
content: Determine the monthly installment amount for a loan Estimate the returns on investments made through SIPs Find out maturity amount and interest earned on PPF Check maturity amount and interest earned on an FD Estimate the pension amount and corpus accumulated under NPS A Mutual Fund Calculator helps estimate the future value of investments

title: India-China direct flights: China Eastern to resume Shanghai-Delhi route after 5 yrs
content: India and China had 539 direct flights operated by airlines including Air India, IndiGo, China Southern and China Eastern . in march 2020, international flights were halted during Covid . thrice-weekly service between Shanghai and Delhi from November 9 .

title: Bihar elections: How Muslim voters shaped results in the last three polls — explained in 5 charts
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." Read More

title: Verstappen takes sprint pole at US Grand Prix
content: Max Verstappen takes top spot in SQ3 to grab pole position . shortened race was 0.071 seconds quicker than his late lap for the race . the two remain free to race, but a collision could open the door for another Vera .

title: Dragunov returns, Rhodes DQ, more
content: Ilja Dragunov defeated Sami Zayn to become the new champion . this week's "SmackDown" felt more like a valley compared to last week . impromptu Undisputed title match broke out after Jacob Fatu was attacked backstage .

title: Mock draft: Betts, Fudd or Miles at No. 1?
content: the WNBA is negotiating a new collective bargaining agreement with the union . the draft lottery, expansion drafts for Toronto and Portland and a mammoth free agency will have to take place before the 2026 draft . five of our top six selections in this mock were eligible to go in the 2025 draft, but all opted to return for a return trip .

title: NHL Power Rankings: Canes on top, one futures bet for each team
content: a panel of ESPN hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . previous ranking: 2 Points percentage: 100% Hurricanes win the Stanley Cup (+800). the first two games showcased Carolina's depth .

title: Chargers' new 'Charger Power' alternate, Lions' all-black lead NFL Week 7 uniforms
content: it's the first time in franchise history the Chargers will wear a gold jersey . the look is meant to channel the energy and "progressive nature" of the air coryell days . on "Thursday Night Football," the Cincinnati Bengals are hosting their annual "White Bengal" game .

title: College football: Why Texas Tech-ASU is worth two bets this week
content: the market moves from Colorado State -1.5 to -2.5 . it feels reactionary after the Rams crushed Fresno State . the result was built on turnover luck and fluky short fields . there are lines that overreacted and matchups that look nothing like what the market thinks they are .

title: The vibes are unusually high for the Giants: 'When you have that kind of spark... it raises everyone's level'
content: new: "the energy is there," tight end says of the team atmosphere . "Get Up" is the result of winning two of three games since rookie Jaxson Dart became the starting quarterback . it's the ultimatum for the Giants to win a game against the Eagles .

title: Ranking the top 25 college football players midway through the 2025 season
content: a midseason top 25 is supposed to look like a major league baseball all-star team . it's hard to separate the flash in the pan from the real deal . a bunch of players we love didn't make the cut . the good news is that a few of the biggest names don't keep this hot start through December .

title: 2025-26 coaching hot seat, retirement guide
content: bob greene: the tectonic shift that deals and revenue sharing have sparked in college sports has not spared the men's basketball coaching carousel and the hot seat discussion . he says it's now clear that patience is at an all-time low if new hires aren't cutting it after two years, they're likely getting forced out the door or at least under significant pressure .

title: Bontemps and Windhorst: The latest intel on the Lakers, Knicks, Rockets and more
content: the deadline for extensions for most eligible players is Monday at 6 p.m. ET . there's a lot of pessimism right now, even by normal standards . a star-studded free agent class in the summer of 2027 could all be available .

title: 🏀 Fantasy NBA predictions: LaMelo 70+ games!
content: our fantasy basketball experts tasked them with detailing their boldest predictions for 2025-26 . he's currently 85th on average in ESPN live drafts, and his ability to create offense for others is only growing . Miller's coaching staff already trust him to find his own shot .

title: Week 8 preview: Ranking Heisman contenders, plus key matchups and top quotes
content: the third Saturday in October delivers a lot of good things in college football . the SEC figures to dominate the spotlight, as it often does, as Ole Miss and Georgia tangle between the hedges . there is also non-SEC action to monitor, including the USC - Notre Dame rivalry, which hopefully will extend beyond Saturday .
